name: #13 (Analogue-Digital-Analogue)
description: These series of drawings are an exploration on the mixture between analogue drawing techniques with ink, and their translation into a digital medium. Color saturation with black works similarly on paper and screens, thus facilitating a perception that is almost equal between a live and digital spectator.   Referencing Sol LeWitt, this particular piece comes with a set of instructions in order to re-translate it into a physical object. The piece is then meant to be exhibited both ways.
